message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand you're on a budget, but I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $82.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
